titleStmt.title: The manner of finding of the true sum of the infinite secants of an arch, by an infinite series which being found and compared with the sum of the secants found, by adding of the secants of whole minutes ... do plainly demonstrate that Mr. Edward Wright's nautical planisphere is not a true projection of the sphere / by Richard Norris, mariner.
titleStmt.author: Norris, Richard, mariner.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. James for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
